channel.title: HELP WITH 3 QUESTIONS ! 317 server
channel.description:
I need help with a few things on my 317 server with 508 + 602 models ...
1) when u talk to men of skillcapes it crashes, how to delete him and how to add new one + where. 2)where to add commands 3) where to add npc that don't move + says text? + code please and where to put. 4)how to add player rights + a text when admins,owners,mods,.. joins game.
THX!
